tool_description:
Thousands of pictures of African American community from 1850 to 1890.
All the images have 4 different sizes and descriptions.
You can search keywords.
name: African American History
title: African American History

api_list.name: Home
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://african-american-history.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "african-american-history.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
